Caption: Figure 5: Confusion matrices for: (a) 10 minute probes from both wired and wireless traces; (b) 40 minute probes from both wired and wireless traces; (c) 40 minute probes from wired traces; (d) 40 minute probes from wireless traces. The color scale is on the right; black corresponds to 1.0 and white corresponds to 0.0.
